name: Brad Gessler (@bradgessler@ruby.social)
summary:
You can now deploy Sqlite Rails apps to production with just a few commands on Fly.io!

This changes the game for smaller Rails apps because you don't need the complexity and expense of Redis and MySQL or Postgres to run the full stack for a small-to-medium size app.

More at https://fly.io/ruby-dispatch/sqlite-and-rails-in-production/
